title: FirmOS Total Business Mastery (3 Pillars)
heading: 3 PILLARS
subtitle: Complete Solution
fullDescription: Get full access to all three pillars, allowing your firm to adapt, scale, and optimize every function with AI-driven automation.

title: FirmOS Business Accelerator (2 Pillars)
heading: 2 PILLARS
subtitle: Dual Focus
fullDescription: Adapt and scale with AI-driven automation. Choose two pillars and seamlessly transition between them as your firm's priorities shift.

title: FirmOS Growth Plan - Core Focus (1 Pillar)
heading: 1 PILLAR
subtitle: Core Focus
fullDescription: Tackle your top priority with AI automation and expert strategy. Choose client acquisition, hiring, or operations, and get the tools to scale efficiently.

title: FirmOS Consulting Subscription
heading: FIRMOS CONSULTING
subtitle: SESSIONS
fullDescription: Get hands-on consulting tailored to your firm's needs with bi-weekly strategy sessions, AI guidance, process templates, and step-by-step execution plans.
